tha-ap378:1.2_0: nor longing for many different flocks.
tha-ap378:1.4_0: with a fairy flying through the sky.
tha-ap378:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap378:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap378:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap378:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bandhumatī.
tha-ap378:7.1_0: sixth kind of scented and sweet,
